name: PowerWash Simulator: The Muckingham Files 2
summary: Three new filthy maps have arrived in PowerWash Simulator in the latest instalment of The Muckingham Files; a series of free content updates expanding the game’s original universe. Whilst residents dish the dirt on your favourite town’s antics, you’ll be busy cleaning up their messes as you're tasked with de-dirtying an Excavator, a Spanish Villa and a Paintball Arena.
